conclusion: Analyze the flow direction and path of the liquid through baffles A, B, C, and D to determine which container it will flow into.
Baffle A: The liquid flows from left to right.
Baffle B: The liquid flows from top to bottom.
Baffle C: The liquid flows from right to left.
Baffle D: The liquid flows from bottom to top.
After Baffle A: The liquid moves horizontally from left to right.
After Baffle B: The liquid moves vertically from top to bottom.
After Baffle C: The liquid moves horizontally from right to left.
After Baffle D: The liquid moves vertically from bottom to top.
The liquid will exit Baffle D and move vertically upwards.
Since the liquid exits Baffle D and moves upwards, it will enter Container E.
